channel.title: git on ArMD
channel.description: Recent content in git on ArMD

item.title: Encrypt and Decrypt files while using git
item.description: Quick steps to automagically encrypt/decrypt files while pushing/pulling with git. Installations We will use git-crypt to encrypt/decrypt files. Read more about git-crypt here. brew install git-crypt Code Snippet 1: Install git-crypt Install gpg brew install gpg Code Snippet 2: Install gpg Setup git-crypt for your github repository Clone your repository or cd into the folder where you have already cloned your repository. Initialise git-crypt in the folder.
